mapper.insert: insert into gym_board ( g_id, gb_title, gb_regdate, gb_ment, gb_video, gb_time, gb_machine, gb_amen, gb_map, gb_hit) values( #{g_id} ,#{gb_title}, sysdate, #{gb_ment}, #{gb_video}, #{gb_time}, #{gb_machine}, #{gb_amen}, #{gb_map, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gb_hit} )
mapper.select: SELECT gb_title, gb_machine, gb_amen, gb_map FROM gym_board WHERE gb_title LIKE '%' || #{totKeyword} || '%' OR gb_machine LIKE '%' || #{totKeyword} || '%' OR gb_amen LIKE '%' || #{totKeyword} || '%' OR gb_map LIKE '%' || #{totKeyword} || '%'
